abstract.t: This document describes an option for negotiating the use of MPLS andIP header compression over the Point-to-Point Protocol [STD51]. Itdefines extensions to the PPP Control Protocol for MPLS [LABELS]. Itis based on, and borrows heavily from, IP Header Compression over PPP[RFC2509]. MPLS/IP header compression is defined in [CMPLS] and maybe applied to MPLS datagrams transporting IPv4 and IPv6 datagrams incombination with TCP, UDP and RTP transport protocols
